plants.germinationNeeds: Start seeds indoors 6-8 weeks before last frost. Needs warm soil (75-90°F) to germinate.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun (6-8 hours). Fertile, well-drained soil. pH 6.2-6.8. Consistent watering is key.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow seeds after all danger of frost has passed. Soil temperature should be at least 70°F. Plant seeds 1 inch deep.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Fertile, well-drained soil. Consistent watering is crucial. Provide a trellis for vining varieties.

plants.germinationNeeds: Start seeds indoors 8-10 weeks before the last frost. Needs warm soil (80-90°F) to germinate. Can be slow to germinate.
plants.optimalConditions: Long, warm growing season. Full sun. Well-drained, sandy loam soil. pH 5.5-6.5. Consistent moisture.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow seeds as soon as the ground can be worked in spring. Prefers cool soil (45-65°F).
plants.optimalConditions: Cool-season crop. Full sun to light shade. Fertile, well-drained soil rich in organic matter. pH 6.5-7.0.

plants.germinationNeeds: Direct sow seeds after the last frost date when soil is warm (at least 70°F). Plant seeds about 1 inch deep.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun (at least 6-8 hours). Fertile, well-drained soil. Very productive; give them space to grow.

plants.germinationNeeds: Best propagated from cuttings or divisions as seeds can be unreliable. Plant in a pot to control its aggressive spread.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun to partial shade. Prefers rich, moist soil. Spreads vigorously via underground runners.
